ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `level` int(8) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '当前用户所处深度' AFTER `admin_id`,
ADD COLUMN `parent_id` int(11) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '上级用户id' AFTER `level`,
MODIFY COLUMN `access_token` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '登录token' AFTER `enabled`,
MODIFY COLUMN `update_time` datetime(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '更新时间' AFTER `access_token`;


ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `resources` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '景区资源' AFTER `email`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `partner_name` varchar(150) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '合作方账户' AFTER `username`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `contract` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '联系人' AFTER `partner_name`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
MODIFY COLUMN `username` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '登录用户名' AFTER `parent_id`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
CHANGE COLUMN `is_del` `is_delete` tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '删除状态 1正常,0删除' AFTER `last_time`;

update `db_daka`.`da_admin`  set is_delete = 0 where is_delete = 1;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `is_resource` tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否是资源账户 0:否，1:是' AFTER `enabled`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `partner_type` int(4) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '资源类型，1:景区资源，2:系统资源' AFTER `is_resource`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
MODIFY COLUMN `is_delete` tinyint(1) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '删除状态 0正常,1删除' AFTER `last_time`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `number` bigint(20) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '商户编号' AFTER `admin_id`;

ALTER TABLE `db_daka`.`da_admin` 
ADD COLUMN `protocol_id` int(11) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '价格协议编号' AFTER `balance`,
ADD COLUMN `margin` decimal(15, 2) NULL DEFAULT 0.00 COMMENT '商户保证金' AFTER `protocol_id`,
ADD COLUMN `authority` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '功能授权' AFTER `margin`;

da_merchant
da_merchant_category
